sentences.en: " Outside are insignia, shown in state ; But here are sweet incense - clouds , quietly ours . "
sentences.cn: 兵卫森画戟, 宴 寝 凝清香.

sentences.en: a church filled with the smell of incense
At the shrine of the god there were offerings, libations and incense.
sentences.cn: 神殿里供奉着牺牲、鬯酒和贡香。

sentences.en: Enough, already with this mellow incense and peppermints vibe.
sentences.cn: 够了, 我受够这些薰香以及薄荷的感觉了.

sentences.en: He has to take us anywhere and we're entitled to an incense - free ride.
sentences.cn: 他必须载我们到任何我们要去的地方,这是他的责任.

sentences.en: Incense and red candles are available in the temple.
Incense can attune the finite to the Infinite .
sentences.cn: 薰香可以使有限调谐至无限。

sentences.en: Mr Sharma lit incense and chanted Sanskrit mantras.
sentences.cn: 夏尔马先生点上香，念起梵文咒语。

sentences.en: Other people burned myrrh as an incense during cremations.
sentences.cn: 其他人在火葬的时候燃烧没药作为熏香之用.

sentences.en: Spectators were incensed by the referee’s decision.
sentences.cn: 观众对裁判的判罚极为愤怒。

sentences.en: That smoking incense, the candles flashing light, scattered, confused by my eyes.
sentences.cn: 那香冒着烟, 那蜡烛闪着光, 星星点点的, 迷茫了我的眼睛.

sentences.en: The heavy odour of incense seemed to cling about its pages and to trouble the brain.
sentences.cn: 它的书页上仿佛散发出浓烈的香气,叫人头晕.

sentences.en: The musty aroma of incense made her head swim.
sentences.cn: 熏香发霉的气味令她感到头晕。

sentences.en: They lighted incense and candles and heaped floral tributes to the dead.
sentences.cn: 他们点燃蜡烛、熏香,为死难者献上花环.

sentences.en: This proposal will incense conservation campaigners.
sentences.cn: 这项提议会激怒环保人士。

sentences.en: Upon the altars rose the incense and bloomed the garlands.
sentences.cn: 祭坛上的香烟袅袅上升,花环上的花朵鲜艳地开着.

sentences.en: Victims were offered, the altars smoked, and the odor of incense filled the air.
sentences.cn: 人们祭献供品, 在圣坛前焚香供奉,空气中香烟缭绕.

trans.tran_en: a substance that has a pleasant smell when you burn it
